DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect on body weight of a combination fenofibrate and metformin on top of a moderate balanced calorie-deficit diet.
DOC.brief_title: A Controlled-Study on the Effect of a Combination of Fenofibrate and Metformin on Weight Loss and Weight Loss-Maintenance, in Obese Patients.
DOC.criteria: Both genders, BMI ≥ 30 kg/m² and <40 kg/m². Known abnormal thyroid hormone levels, or high thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH) level.
